corrections.error: 5 erros TypeScript no módulo integrations: ValueObject Props não satisfaziam constraint Record<string, unknown> (BankSlip, BankTransaction, PixCharge, SefazResponse); OFX parser sem tipos adequados, causando erro 'Property STMTTRNRS does not exist on type OfxValue'
corrections.correction: Adicionado extends Record<string, unknown> em todas as Props interfaces para satisfazer constraint de ValueObject<T>. Criado interfaces tipadas completas para OFX parsing (OfxParsedData, OfxStatement, OfxBankAccount, OfxTransaction). Adicionado null safety checks para statement e accountInfo. Adicionado campo AVAILBAL à interface OfxBankAccount.
